origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialDataAPI.get_capital_adequacy_ratio', 'description': 'Get the capital adequacy ratio data for a specific bank over the past five years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'capital_adequacy_data', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing the capital adequacy ratio data for each year.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.analyze_key_factors', 'description': 'Analyze the key factors affecting the capital adequacy ratio using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'capital_adequacy_data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The capital adequacy ratio data for the past five years.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'key_factors', 'description': 'A list of key factors affecting the capital adequacy ratio.'}]}, {'name': 'AIPrediction.predict_future_trend', 'description': 'Predict the future trend of the capital adequacy ratio for the next year using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'capital_adequacy_data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The capital adequacy ratio data for the past five years.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'future_trend', 'description': 'The predicted trend of the capital adequacy ratio for the next year.'}]}, {'name': 'AIManagement.provide_recommendations', 'description': 'Provide recommendations for capital adequacy ratio management based on AI analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'key_factors', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The key factors affecting the capital adequacy ratio.'}, {'name': 'future_trend', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The predicted trend of the capital adequacy ratio for the next year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'A list of recommendations for capital adequacy ratio management.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要评估人工智能技术在资本充足率管理中的应用。首先，获取Bank of America过去五年的资本充足率数据。然后，使用人工智能算法分析资本充足率的关键因素。接着，预测未来一年的资本充足率趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的资本充足率管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去五年的资本充足率数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
